content.text: Hi there! What do you do for a living?
I just started college, I want to be a veterinarian.
Wow, that's a great goal! I'm a stay at home mom and I love it.
That must be fun, what are your hobbies?
I enjoy decorating for holidays and I love to cook!
That sounds really fun, I'm not very crafty but I love to cook too!
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta, it's so easy and it always turns out delicious!
That's a great choice, pasta is my favorite too!
What's your favorite kind of pasta?
I love penne, how about you?
I love penne too! I also love spaghetti and fettuccine.
Those are my favorites too! I love the way the sauce clings to the noodles.
Me too! I love making a big pot of pasta and eating it with a big salad.
That sounds delicious! I'm getting hungry just thinking about it.
Me too! I think I'm going to make some pasta for dinner tonight.
That's a great idea, I might do the same!
Perfect! We can have a pasta party!
